name: reddit clean & dark ( imgur inspired design )
description: This is one of the reasons for making this style: http://imgur.com/gallery/pnxQOf6 If you have comments or suggestions.. feedback is welcome! I hope you like it :-) works only in Chrome and Opera for now. If people like it, I might port it to Firefox
additional_info:

- Now rating+voting arrows show on mouse-over (on the right)

Updated the side-panel (search, login, submit posts).

Updated to make the style play nice with Reddit Enhancement suite.

V1.0:
Initial release.
